statements: SELECT * FROM spatial_indexes;
SELECT id FROM spatial_indexes;
SELECT location FROM spatial_indexes;
SELECT id, location FROM spatial_indexes;
SELECT * FROM spatial_indexes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM spatial_indexes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, id FROM spatial_indexes WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, 'POINT(-73.9851904 40.7581286)') < 1000;
SELECT id FROM spatial_indexes WHERE ST_CONTAINS(ST_BUFFER(ST_GeogPoint(-73.9851904, 40.7581286), 1000), location);
SELECT id, ST_AsText(location) AS coordinates FROM spatial_indexes WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(-73.9851904 40.7581286)', 1000);
SELECT id, location FROM spatial_indexes WHERE ST_Area(location) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM spatial_data WHERE longitude < -80;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, location FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT spatial_index, data_id FROM spatial_index WHERE data_id = 5;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM spatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, ST_AsText(location) FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)', 10);
SELECT * FROM spatial_data INNER JOIN spatial_index ON spatial_data.id = spatial_index.data_id;
SELECT id, ST_Distance(location, 'POINT(-118.2437 34.0522)') AS distance FROM spatial_data ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(region_id) AS num_regions FROM regions GROUP BY region_name HAVING num_regions > 1;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT data_id, location_id, region_id FROM spatial_data WHERE region_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY data_id DESC, location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations l JOIN spatial_data s ON l.location_id = s.location_id WHERE l.longitude < -100 ORDER BY l.latitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(location_id) AS max_location_id, AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude FROM locations GROUP BY location_id HAVING AVG(latitude) > 35 ORDER BY max_location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations
SELECT id, name, location FROM Locations ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT event_id, name, date FROM Events ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT coordinate_id, latitude, longitude FROM Coordinates WHERE longitude > 0
SELECT * FROM Locations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, location FROM Locations WHERE id > 10 AND location IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM Users WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT coordinate_id, latitude, longitude FROM Coordinates WHERE latitude >= 40.0 AND longitude <= -100.0
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, coordinates FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT name, population FROM cities WHERE area > 1000;
SELECT country_id, name, population FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT index_name, indexed_table_name, index_type FROM spatial_index;
SELECT name, population FROM cities;
SELECT country_id, name, population FROM countries WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT name, area FROM countries WHERE area BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance < 50 ORDER BY distance DESC;

SELECT l.name AS source_location, c.name AS destination_location, d.distance FROM distances d JOIN locations l ON d.source_location_id = l.location_id JOIN locations c ON d.destination_location_id = c.location_id;
